revised_title: On the Dynamical Theory of Tides of Long Period: A Critique of Laplace's Method
tldr: This article critiques Laplace's method for treating tides of long period and offers a dynamical solution based on a paper by Sir William Thomson. The author argues that oceanic tidal friction is not sufficient to produce the effects Laplace claimed and presents an alternative approach to solving the equations of motion for tidal oscillations.
